data.title: Portland Trail Blazers Roster
data.meta_description: Portland Trail Blazers scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Scoot Henderson was selected as the #3 pick in the First Round of the 2023 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Scoot Henderson signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 1, 2023.

Kris Murray was selected as the #23 pick in the First Round of the 2023 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Kris Murray signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 1, 2023.

Rayan Rupert was selected as the #13 pick in the Second Round of the 2023 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Rayan Rupert signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 4, 2023.

Shaedon Sharpe was selected as the #7 pick in the First Round of the 2022 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Shaedon Sharpe signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 1, 2022.

Anfernee Simons was selected as the #24 pick in the First Round of the 2018 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Anfernee Simons signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 2, 2018. Anfernee Simons re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 6, 2022.

Jabari Walker was selected as the #27 pick in the Second Round of the 2022 NBA Draft by the Portland Trail Blazers. Jabari Walker signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 13, 2022.

Deandre Ayton was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Phoenix Suns on September 27, 2023.

Dalano Banton was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Boston Celtics on February 8, 2024.

Malcolm Brogdon was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Boston Celtics on October 1, 2023.

Toumani Camara was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Phoenix Suns on September 27, 2023.

Jerami Grant was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Detroit Pistons on July 6, 2022. Jerami Grant signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 9, 2023.

Matisse Thybulle was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Philadelphia Sixers on February 9, 2023. Matisse Thybulle re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Portland Trail Blazers on July 10, 2023.

Robert Williams was acquired in a trade by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Boston Celtics on October 1, 2023.
